Workflow.Name: Set Required Level Of Ultimate Client
Workflow.Description: If Project Procurement equals "Design+Construct/Design-Build/ECI,Alliance,Design-Build-Operate,Management Contracting/Construction Management,Turnkey" then set 'Ultimate Client' as Business Required

LocalizedName.description: Set Required Level Of Ultimate Client

Description.description: If Project Procurement equals "Design+Construct/Design-Build/ECI,Alliance,Design-Build-Operate,Management Contracting/Construction Management,Turnkey" then set 'Ultimate Client' as Business Required
